title: NovaSolNetwork
author: NovaSolNetwork
created_time: April 17, 2023, 02:46:04 AMLast edit: April 24, 2023, 12:14:51 PM by NovaSolNetwork
content: NovaSol NetworkNovaSol is a decentralized cryptocurrency that was launched in April 2023 with the goal of creating a secure, fast, and flexible cryptocurrency that is accessible to a wide range of users. The NovaSol blockchain is powered by both Proof of Work (PoW) and Proof of Stake (PoS) mechanisms, which ensures that the network is completely decentralized and resistant to censorship and manipulation.One of the key features of NovaSol is its masternodes, which perform advanced functions on the network such as instant transactions, governance, and voting. Masternodes also help to increase the speed and efficiency of the network.Custom tokens can be created on the NovaSol blockchain, which can be used for a variety of purposes such as fundraising, loyalty programs, and more. This adds flexibility and utility to the cryptocurrency, and allows users to create custom tokens that are tailored to their specific needs.The NovaSol blockchain is designed to be fast and efficient, with transactions processed quickly and securely. This makes it more appealing to users who value speed and reliability, and helps to ensure that the network can handle a high volume of transactions.Why Choose NovaSol?Decentralized: The utilization of both Proof of Work (PoW) and Proof of Stake (PoS) mechanisms guarantees the absolute decentralization of the NovaSol network.Masternodes: Earn a passive income and vote with our multiplan masternodes.Tokens: Tokens are digital assets created and managed on NovaSol.Secure: The implementation of our current and upcoming algorithm will ensure the security and integrity of the NovaSol blockchain.BlockChain SpecificationsCoin Name: NovaSol NetworkCoin Symbol: XNSBlock Time: 15 SecondsMaximum Supply: 26,000,000 XNSPremine: 520,000 XNS (2%) (Premine plan will soon be announced)Algorithm: Argon2id/Chukwa (New algorithm on block 345,600)Block Rewards: https://github.com/NovaSolNetwork/NovaSol#block-rewardsResource LinksWebsite: https://novasol.network/Block Explorer: https://explorer.novasol.network/Official Pool: https://pool.novasol.networkPaper Wallet: https://novasol.network/paper-walletGithub: https://github.com/NovaSolNetwork/NovaSol/Latest Release: https://github.com/NovaSolNetwork/NovaSol/releases/latestDesktop Wallet: https://github.com/NovaSolNetwork/novasol-desktop-wallet/releases/latestAndroid Wallet: https://github.com/NovaSolNetwork/novasol-mobile-wallet/releases/latestSocial MediaTwitter: https://twitter.com/NovaSolNetworkTelegram Channel: https://instagram.com/NovaSolNetworkDiscord: https://discord.gg/7VzyputumBTelegram: https://t.me/NovaSolNetworkRoadmap ~ Q1 2023 ~- Desktop Wallet (https://github.com/NovaSolNetwork/novasol-desktop-wallet/releases/latest)- Android Wallet (https://github.com/NovaSolNetwork/novasol-mobile-wallet/releases/latest)- Burning address- Masternodes- Hardware Wallet ~ Q2 2023 ~ - Dekstop Wallet v2- Staking- New Algorithm- Tokens- Web3 Wallet- Custom Wallet AddressesVisit https://novasol.network/ for the latest updates on NovaSol's.

comments.author: NovaSolNetwork
comments.body: Quote from: r362318809 on April 18, 2023, 01:09:35 AMHello diabetic, I thought you died in the last XSC project. How are you going to cheat this time to escape? Is the node easy to sell? Will anyone fall for it? Is this scam still working? hahhaahahahGreetings r362318809,I have observed that a discussion regarding this matter has taken place on the Discord server. However, I would like to clarify that I am not associated with the aforementioned project in any capacity. I kindly request that you maintain a respectful and courteous demeanor in future interactions.Thank you for your understanding.

comments.author: Butterflyman
comments.body: Same old spam in a can scam. Snowflake, Cryptic, Indium, SmartCube, Snowflake.... Seriously, you really need to find a new hobby. This is getting tiresome. Argue and try to prove you're not related to these past failed scammy shammy projects all you want. Most miners who've been around long enough on BT know what I'm on about.My advise.. Start a genuine project with genuine ideas without trying to scam and maybe one of your many attempted "projects" will actually succeed!

comments.author: Viecoin
comments.body: Mining is easy and I think your project is well thought out. I'm impressed by the cli wallet. I'd say that it is such a nice project to reconsider your premine.

comments.author: gnyzbk
comments.body: coin fiyatı ile hesapladığında %60-70 arası zararla kazmış oluyorsun. sayfada admin ile ilgili oluşturan bir sürü yorumda var ayrıca. kar getiriyor olsa kazdığımı satar çıkarım dersinde öyle bişey de yok. algosu da kartları yoruyor. nereden tutsan elinde kalıyor.

comments.body: Is this another project by Apple juice?

comments.body: It seems the rug was pulled, I feel sorry for those that invested in MN.

comments.body: Scam like i told anybody on there discord. Please everybody pay attention.

comments.author: Vidati
comments.body: Damn, i was close to buying a MN of the lower tier and i did mention this on their discord only to have the "Main Dev" Contact me asking when i will buy one. This was a red flag for me and i never did. Be careful guys.
